file.name: root_path.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Main Openapi Yaml
  version: 0.1.0
servers:
  - url: "{server}:{port}"
    variables:
      server:
        default: http://localhost
      port:
        default: "8980"
paths:
  /:
    get:
      operationId: operation_get
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "202":
          description: Accepted
    put:
      operationId: operation_put
      responses:
        "202":
          description: Accepted
    post:
      operationId: operation_post
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Pet'
      responses:
        "202":
          description: Accepted
    delete:
      operationId: operation_delete
      responses:
        "202":
          description: Accepted
components:
  schemas:
    Pet:
      required:
        - id
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
